post.body: :) Me as well. I'm already looking for an iPhone Developer to help build it ;)
Actually, the inverse - you need to show up with the fun. Details in a couple weeks :)
:) It wasn't bad - but you were missed, and it was noted. You only get four absences a year, you know!
Yep. We talked about you. We do that with everyone who doesn't show up ;)
Thanks - it was my pleasure. But the next Tweetup will involve homework by all :)
Hawaii is a good place to be. I lived there for 3 years! So you have a valid excuse :)
:) We'll be happy to see you at the next one!
Sure - we can do a Weekend Tweetup in January.
:) There were 20 people there 20 minutes ago. I just got home :)
I will. 22 people and still growing!
sleep or beer, and you choose sleep?
great! See you there, then!
we'll see you at the next one!
I am!
someone has to be first! :)
Join us at the Tweetuo tonight - http://is.gd/ec4V - would love to meet you!
BTW, at our San Antonio Teetup tonight, we designed a killer iPhone application. Yeah, we are nerds, but we are FUN nerds!
23 people at the peak at todays San Antonio Tweetup. Nice crowd. Diverse, yet all with at least one thing in common - Twitter! :)
San Antonio Tweetup http://twitpic.com/y2bz
At Flying Saucer for final San Antonio Tweetup of 2008! http://twitpic.com/y1m6
